content.query:
USE logical_DWH_nyc_taxi;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.second_reporting_table_proc
    @year VARCHAR(5),
    @month VARCHAR(3)

AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @create_statement NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_statement NVARCHAR(MAX);

    -- Drop statement to remove existing reporting table if it exists
    SET @drop_statement = 
        'IF OBJECT_ID(''gold.second_reporting_table' + @year + '_' + @month + ''') IS NOT NULL ' +
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.second_reporting_table' + @year + '_' + @month + ';';

    PRINT(@drop_statement);
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_statement;

    -- Create statement for the new reporting table
    SET @create_statement = 
        'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.second_reporting_table' + @year + '_' + @month + ' ' +
        'WITH ( ' +
        '    LOCATION = ''gold_layer/second_reporting_data/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + ''', ' +
        '    DATA_SOURCE = logical_DWH_exDS, ' +
        '    FILE_FORMAT = parquert_file ' +
        ') AS ' +
        'SELECT ' +
        '    vtrip.year, vtrip.month, ' +
        '    CONVERT(DATE, vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date, ' +
        '    tz.Borough, ' +
        '    cl.day_name AS trip_day, ' +
        '    CASE WHEN cl.day_name IN (''Saturday'', ''Sunday'') THEN ''Y'' ELSE ''N'' END AS weekend_ind, ' +
        '  sum(case when tt.trip_type_desc = ''Dispatch'' then 1 else 0 end) as count_Dispatch_trips,' +
        '   sum(case when tt.trip_type_desc = ''Street-hail'' then 1 else 0 end) as count_Street_hail_trips,'+
        '   sum(vtrip.trip_distance) as total_trip_distance,'+
        '    sum(vtrip.fare_amount) as total_fare_amount,'+
        '   sum(DATEDIFF(minute, vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime,vtrip.lpep_dropoff_datetime )) as total_duration'+
        ' FROM ' +
        '    silver.view_partitioning_trip_data vtrip ' +
        '    JOIN silver.taxi_zones tz ON vtrip.PULocationID = tz.LocationID ' +
        '    JOIN silver.calendar cl ON CONVERT(DATE, vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime) = cl.date ' +
        '     join silver.trip_type tt on vtrip.trip_type = tt.trip_type ' +
        'WHERE vtrip.year = ''' + @year + ''' AND vtrip.month = ''' + @month + ''' ' +
        'GROUP BY ' +
        '    vtrip.year, vtrip.month, ' +
        '    CONVERT(DATE, vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime), ' +
        '    tz.Borough, ' +
        '    cl.day_name;';

    PRINT(@create_statement);
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_statement;

END;
